invoker.name: WhatsUp 2022
invoker.description: WhatsUp Gold is a commercial network and infrastructure monitoring tool by Ipswitch (now Progress) that gives IT teams real-time visibility into devices, servers, applications, network traffic, configurations, logs, and cloud environments. It uses automatic Layer 2/3 discovery to map your network topology and offers customizable dashboards, alerts (email/SMS/Slack) and report generation
invoker.hint: WhatsUp Gold is a monitoring tool. Read api documentation https://docs.ipswitch.com/NM/WhatsUpGold2022/02_Guides/rest_api/index.html#section/Overview
